snippet: The president of a college stresses a responsibility to protect students, and a reader suggests a return to old-fashioned dating.
abstract: Letter from Saint Anselm College president Steven R DiSalvo comments on March 30 front page article on colleges' response to sexual misconduct on campuses.
lead_paragraph: The president of a college stresses a responsibility to protect students, and a reader suggests a return to old-fashioned dating.
